title: [SOLVED]820-3662 no backlight
message:
Hello,

Have a 15in retina with no backlight. Replaced the lvds connector due to corrosion but still no backlight. PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT measures @ 54.76v, PP5VR3V3_SW_LCD @ 5.017v. 

I've ohmed out the connection checking from the pads on the board to the other end of an lvds cable (not connected to the display). Also tried another display with the same outcome. 

Any idea what else could be causing the backlight to not come on?

title: [SOLVED]820-3662 no backlight
message: 54 volts means it doesn't see the screen. Have you tried a known good screen?

title: [SOLVED]820-3662 no backlight
message: Yep tried a good screen. schematic says it should be 55v, isn't 55.76 close enough.

title: [SOLVED]820-3662 no backlight
message: Backlight should be around 30ish volts on these. 55 volts on backlight means it doesn't see a load or it doesn't see the light of the screen. Usually this is bad LCD connector, LCD cable, or screen. So in your case, inspect soldering on LCD connector and make sure it isn't burned.

title: [SOLVED]820-3662 no backlight
message: I bet pin 1 on the LCD connector or cable is fucked. Nothing wrong with the actual backlight circuit for sure!

title: [SOLVED]820-3662 no backlight
message: Gents you all are awesome. Since the backlight circuitry was working, looked into the display and found the backlight connector on the display was unplugged. Thanks a lot guys.
